scripts.test: ./build.sh test && ANCHOR_NAME=anchor_contract REGISTRY_NAME=registry_contract OCT_NAME=oct_contract WRAPPED_APPCHAIN_TOKEN=wrapped_appchain_token jest test --runInBand
scripts.e2e:testnet: ./build.sh && NODE_ENV=testnet ANCHOR_NAME=anchor_contract REGISTRY_NAME=registry_contract OCT_NAME=oct_contract WRAPPED_APPCHAIN_TOKEN=wrapped_appchain_token jest test --runInBand
scripts.e2e:local: ./build.sh && NODE_ENV=local ANCHOR_NAME=anchor_contract REGISTRY_NAME=registry_contract OCT_NAME=oct_contract WRAPPED_APPCHAIN_TOKEN=wrapped_appchain_token jest test --runInBand
